block.p: $2.5 million 72 Reade Street (Church Street) 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 3,400-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated pre-World War II building; kitchen with Sub-Zero refrigerator and granite countertops; high tin ceilings, maple floors, original decorative columns, marble bath with whirlpool bath and steam shower; gas fireplace, central air-conditioning, terrace, 4 exposures, washer-dryer in unit; common charge $540; taxes $22,200; listed at $2.7 million, 17 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$2.5 million 72 Reade Street (Church Street) 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 3,400-sq.-ft. condo in a renovated pre-World War II building; kitchen with Sub-Zero refrigerator and granite countertops; high tin ceilings, maple floors, original decorative columns, marble bath with whirlpool bath and steam shower; gas fireplace, central air-conditioning, terrace, 4 exposures, washer-dryer in unit; common charge $540; taxes $22,200; listed at $2.7 million, 17 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$995,000 157 East 18th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a post-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen; hardwood floors, dining area, windowed kitchen with upgraded appliances; maintenance $1,500, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $1.1 million, 33 weeks on market (broker: Eychner Associates)

$1.11 million 411 West End Avenue (79th Street) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. co-op in a pre-World War II building; 24-hr. doormen; dining area, sunken living room, renovated kitchen and baths, dressing room off master bedroom suite, 2 exposures, partial Hudson River view; maintenance $1,419, 38% tax-deductible; listed at $1.125 million, 14 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$950,000 2 Grace Court 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,600-sq.-ft. co-op in a pre-World War II building; dining room, eat-in kitchen, library, separate maid's quarters with 1/2-bath; fireplace, central air-conditioning, high ceilings, hardwood floors, common roof deck; harbor and Manhattan skyline views; maintenance $1,725, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $995,000, 16 weeks on market (broker: Brenton Realty)

$1.175 million 939 Union Street (Shinnecock) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,800-sq.-ft. condo in a new building; part-time doormen; dining area, eat-in kitchen, den, master bath with whirlpool bath and steam shower; hardwood floors, terrace, 4 exposures; common charge $1,200; taxes to be assessed; listed at $1.175 million, 1 week on market (broker: Harbor View Realty)

$412,000 50 Sharon Street 2-bedroom, 1-bath, pre-World War II town house; renovated eat-in kitchen, windowed den, high ceilings, hardwood floors, new windows, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,490; listed at $419,000, 9 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$600,000 84-39 126th Street 2-family. 64-year-old, semi-attached brick house; 3 bedrooms in primary unit; 2 bedrooms in other; dining area, eat-in kitchen in each; finished basement, 2-car garage, 29-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,100; listed at $629,000, 6 weeks on market (brokers: Century 21/Milestone Realty; Kingdom Realty)

$635,000 10 Case Avenue 2-family, new stone and stucco-sided, colonial-style house; 3 bedrooms, 3 baths, dining area, eat-in kitchen, den, whirlpool bath, hardwood floors in primary unit; 500-sq.-ft. studio with washer-dryer in finished basement; 1-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $649,900, 39 weeks on market (broker: Sari Kingsley Real Estate)

$1.5 million 5 Daffodil Lane 4-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 46-year-old center-hall colonial-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, French doors, hardwood floors, rear deck with whirlpool bath, new furnace, in-ground pool, 2-car garage, 1.02-acre lot; taxes $8,174; listed at $1.5 million, 2 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker/Greenwich; William Pitt Real Estate)
